products.title: Azurite Chenille Coral Pink Curtain
products.metadescription: Azurite chenille coral pink curtain in pink. Made to measure from 29.04 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. These soft coral pink curtains fuse a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary pink tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. These curtains are perfect to add richness and a splash of colour when paired with cool, contemporary greys. All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk. 
 
We are so proud of the finish and quality, all their curtains come with a free 5-year guarantee for additional peace of mind that you are investing in a something that will stand the test of time. This fabric is also available as a roman blind. 

 
 Product id: db-cur1225 fabric colour: coral pink material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes
